title: Downward Facing Dog
description: Keep both toes pointed towards the fronts of your mat and sink your heels towards the floor.

title: Mountain Pose
description: Engage your quads, rotate your thighs inward, and let your arms hang naturally.

title: Extended Side Angle
description: Engage your quads, rotate your thighs inward, for more better yoga.

title: Garland Pose
description: Squatting isn't something familiar to most 21st-century humans. However, it's an excellent around the pelvis.

title: Half Forward Bend
description: Inhale as you raise your head slightly and draw yours houlders back, making your back as flat as possible.

title: Tree Pose
description: keep your shoulders down and away form yours ears, and your hips squared.
